column4: I want to try out the Feisty 7.04 beta. Is it possible for it to co-exist on my computer with Edgy? Do I have to put in on a separate partition? What do I need to do?
Ok thanks... And how about grub? Will the feisty installer modify it to show both the fesity parition installation and the edgy partition installation?
Anyone know how far away until the first non-beta release of feisty?
